name: The Hungry Necromancer
description:
Move arrows to push the Undead around and make them grab food for you while you lounge at home waiting for them to get back.

The Hungry Necromancer is a puzzle game, use arrows to change the direction of Undead skeletons and get them to grab food on their way to the end points.

Sounds and music made by me! (Sorry if the music isn't that good/fitting for the game. I've never made music before and wanted to give it a try. If you really don't like it you can mute the music on the title screen.)

Submission for Miz Jam 1. Made in around 30 hours over the course of a week. I hope I didn't break any rules!
